value.name: Kevin Fox: Father Wrongfully Charged in Daughter’s Murder Spent Months in Jail
value.description: Kevin Fox was wrongfully charged with his 3-year-old daughter Riley Fox's murder and spent months in jail before the charges were dropped due to DNA evidence.
